<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registry">Registry&lt;T&gt;</a></>}>
A global registry used in conjunction with static constructors to make pluggable components (like targets or garbage collectors) &quot;just work&quot; when linked with an executable. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registry/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the executable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// This function is exported by the executable and called by the plugin to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// add a node to the executable&#39;s registry. Therefore it&#39;s not defined here</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// to avoid it being instantiated in the plugin and is instead defined in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the executable (see LLVM&#95;INSTANTIATE&#95;REGISTRY below).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// A static registration template. Use like such:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///   Registry&lt;Collector&gt;::Add&lt;FancyGC&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///   X(&quot;fancy-gc&quot;, &quot;Newfangled garbage collector.&quot;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Use of this template requires that:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///  1 The registered subclass has a default constructor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V&gt;</span></CodeLine>
